mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login, name, email, created) VALUES (#{login}, #{name}, #{email}, #{created}); INSERT INTO auth (user_login, password, role) VALUES (#{login}, #{password}, #{role});
mapper.select: SELECT login, password, name, email, created, role FROM users INNER JOIN auth ON users.login = auth.user_login;
SELECT login, password, name, email, created, role FROM users INNER JOIN auth ON users.login = auth.user_login WHERE login = #{login};
SELECT login, password, name, email, created, role FROM users INNER JOIN auth ON users.login = auth.user_login WHERE login = (SELECT user_login FROM cookies WHERE id = #{id});
